name: 托马斯·杨
bio_short: 英国博学家，被誉为“最后一个无所不晓的人”。他在物理学（光的波动理论、杨氏模量）、生物学（三原色视觉）和语言学（破译罗塞塔石碑）上均做出了奠基性贡献。
bio_short_en: An English polymath, 'The Last Man Who Knew Everything'. He made foundational contributions in physics (wave theory of light, Young's Modulus), biology (trichromatic color theory), and linguistics (deciphering the Rosetta Stone).
